abstract: Washington Mutual said Friday that it had reached a settlement with JPMorgan Chase and the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation that is expected to bring it about $6 billion and help resolve its bankruptcy.
snippet: Washington Mutual said Friday that it had reached a settlement with JPMorgan Chase and the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation that is expected to bring it about $6 billion and help resolve its bankruptcy.
lead_paragraph: Washington Mutual said Friday that it had reached a settlement with JPMorgan Chase and the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation that is expected to bring Washington Mutual about $6 billion and help resolve its bankruptcy. But the deal could leave WaMu’s shareholders out in the cold, Reuters reports.

headline.main: WaMu Settles With JPMorgan and F.D.I.C.
